name: Hobby or Business Tool
agency: Hobby or Business Tool Performance Dashboard
description: This public beta release of the tool is for people who are getting money or intend to get money from creative works, and are unsure if they are a hobby or a business. The tool guides them on their government obligations.
target_users: The first release applies to artists, creatives and makers. Future enhancements to the tool, building on the public beta, will add new user groups, and over time, the digital take-up figure will reflect the increasing number of users who are able to use it.

widgets.name: User Satisfaction
widgets.definition: Overall satisfaction score includes all ratings weighted from 100% for very satisfied to 0% for very dissatisfied

widgets.name: Completion Rate
widgets.definition: Percentage of transactions made using the digital service.

widgets.name: Users who navigated to another site
widgets.definition: This shows the percentage of users who click through to an external website from the Hobby or Business tool. Please note that these figures represent aggregated clicks to external government sites.

widgets.name: How users are finding the hobby or business tool
widgets.definition: This shows the percentage of visits to the tool that came directly from business.gov.au or other external sites ie government, private sector or social media.

widgets.name: Users requiring help from contact centre
widgets.definition: This shows number of users who sought help from the contact centre about the Hobby or Business tool as a percentage of overall number of visits to business.gov.au.

widgets.name: Devices used by users
widgets.definition: This shows the types of devices used by users to access the Hobby or Business tool.

widgets.name: Browsers used by users
widgets.definition: This shows the types of browsers used by users to access the Hobby or Business tool.

widgets.name: Fact
widgets.description: 85% of users who received a business or hobby result thought the tool was helpful.

widgets.name: Fact
widgets.description: The ATO page "Income you must declare" is the most clicked obligation link on the results page.
